title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Skills: Language-Based Learning Relationship Building for Multinational Leadership Team Building

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can recognize five or more cultural differences and explain collaboration strategies that leverage them.
Learners can establish sustained learning relationships with at least three peers in team projects.
Learners can use business English expressions reflecting cultural context with over 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
